question: Neomycin is used in which of the following vaccines to prevent bacterial contamination?
exp: MMR vaccine and IPV each contains less than 25 mg of neomycin per dose. Persons who are known to be allergic to neomycin should be closely observed after vaccination so that any allergic reaction can be treated at once.
topic_name: Impoant facts in Immunization, Newer Vaccines

question: Efficacy of Measles vaccine after second dose:-
exp: Efficacy of Measles Vaccine:- >90% with 1 dose. >99% with 2 doses. (AMMRS Strategy)
topic_name: Impoant facts in Immunization, Newer Vaccines

question: A boy complained of unprovoked bite by a local dog in the community. The dog was later caught by the local animal authorities and appeared to the healthy. The most appropriate course of action would be:
exp: The boy should be treated irrespective of the condition of the dog with PEP including vaccination and local wound treatment, Immunoglobulins may be used in Category 3 bite. The dog should be observed for 10 days, and if the dog remains healthy throughout the period, PEP may be discontinued. However, PEP should NOT be withheld.
opa: Give post-exposure prophylaxis to the bitten person with cell-culture derived vaccine
opb: Withhold vaccination, keep the dog under observation for ten days for signs of rabies
opc: Test the dog for rabies antibodies
opd: Immediately carry out euthanasia of the dog
topic_name: Impoant facts in Immunization, Newer Vaccines

question: Which one of the following doses in Loeffler units of Diphtheria Toxoid is incorporated in DPT vaccine per dose?
exp: DPT VACCINE: Composition of DPT Vaccine: Amount per dose (0. 5 ml) Contents Glaxo Kasauli Diphtheria Toxoid Tetanus Toxoid Peussis killed acellular bacilli Aluminium phosphate Thiomersal 25 Lf 5 Lf 20, 000 million 2. 5 mg 0. 01% 30 Lf 10 Lf 32, 000 million 3. 0 mg 0. 01%
topic_name: Impoant facts in Immunization, Newer Vaccines

question: Mission Indradhanush includes all vaccines except?
exp: MISSION INDRADHANUSH: - Launched by Ministry of Health & Family Welfare - Its aim is 100% coverage by 'catchup compaign' irrespective of previous immunization status, by 2020 - Initially included vaccines against 7 vaccine preventable diseases (Now 12). They were: TB Polio Diphtheria Peussis Tetanus Hepatitis-B Measles Recently- Rotavirus, MR, IPV, JE are included in this.
topic_name: Impoant facts in Immunization, Newer Vaccines

question: Strain used for production of Measles vaccine is:
exp: Strains Used For Measles Vaccine Edmonston Zagreb Strain (Most common) Schwarz strain Moraten strain Vaccine Strains Dengue/Dengavaxia: CYD-TDV BCG: Danish 1331 Mumps: Jeryl Lynn Rubella: RA 27/3 YF: 17D Varicella: Oka JE: SA 14-14-2 H1. N1: A/California/2009 Mosquirix: S, S/AS01 (World's first & only licensed malaria vaccine. It is prepared from circumsporozoite protein of plasmodium falciparum using hepatitis B surface antigen) HIV: mvA (Modified vaccinia ankara) Typhoral: Ty21a Anthrax: Sterne
topic_name: Impoant facts in Immunization, Newer Vaccines

question: Dose of Rubella immunoglobulin is:
exp: IMMUNOGLOBULIN DOSAGES Disease / agent Dose Hepatitis A 0. 02 ml / kg BW (3. 2 mg / kg BW) Hepatitis B 0. 05 - 0. 07 ml/kg BW (8-11 mg/kg BW) Hepatitis C 0. 05 ml/kg BW (3. 2-8 mg/kg BW) Measles 0. 25 ml/kg BW Rubella 20 ml Varicella 15-25 units/kg BW Rabies 20 IU/kg BW (HRIg), 40 IC /kg BW (ERIg) Tetanus 250 units (Prophylaxis), 3000 - 6000 units treatment Rh isoimmunization 200-300 mcg per 15 ml Rh+ ve blood exposure
topic_name: Impoant facts in Immunization, Newer Vaccines

question: S, S is strain of.......... Vaccine:-
exp: MOSQUIRIX:- First & only licensed malaria Vaccine (2019 by WHO- use in 3 areas- pilot Ghana, Kenya and Malawi) Include 3 things 1 Preerythrocytic circumsporozoite protein of Plasmodium falciparum. 2 Viral envelope proteins of HBs Ag. 3 "ASO1" Adjuvant.
topic_name: Impoant facts in Immunization, Newer Vaccines

question: Sticker shown on Vaccine ls indicate:-
exp: - Sticker shown on Vaccine ls indicate maintainance of Cold chain - Vaccine Vial Monitor (VVM) Rules for VVM use in India: Rule 1: if inner square is lighter than the outer circle, the vaccine may be used Rule 2: If inner square is the same color as, or darker than the outer circle, vaccine must not be used. WHO Grade Outer Circle Inner Square Inference Grade I Blue White Vial can be used Grade II Blue Light blue Vial can be used Grade III Blue Blue Vial CANNOT be used Grade IV Blue Purple/Black Vial CANNOT be used
topic_name: Impoant facts in Immunization, Newer Vaccines

question: Lyophilised (Freeze dried) vaccine do not include:-
exp: Lyophilized ( freezed dried ) vaccine:- Available in Powder form Examples:- BCG Yellow Fever Japanese Encephalitis HiB Require Saline Measles MMR Distilled water / saline water - Reconstructed vaccines should be used before 4hrs other wise they may case Toxic shock syndrome.
topic_name: Impoant facts in Immunization, Newer Vaccines

question: The role of adjuvant in a DPT vaccine is:-
exp: Aluminum hydroxide / phosphate is used as Adjuvant/adsorbent in DPT vaccine; Binds three components (D, P, T) together Increases immunogenicity / Antigenicity - Thiomersal is added to DPT vaccine as a preservative. - Magnesium chloride is added to OPV vaccine: Provides stability.
opd: Increase the shelf life of a vaccine
topic_name: Impoant facts in Immunization, Newer Vaccines

question: Which of the following is not a Cholera vaccine?
exp: Ty21A is strain of typhoid vaccine. Rest all strains given are used for Cholera. Different vaccines & their strains: VACCINE STRAIN BCG Danish 1331 OPV P1, P2, P3 Measles Edmonston zagreb, schwarez, Moraten Mumps Jeryll Lynn Rubella RA 27/3 Yellow fever 17D Varicella Oka H1. N1 A7/ California/2009 Rabies fixed viral strain Anthrax Sterne strain Anti-malarial Litic cocktail Mosquirix S, S Anti-HIV MVA
topic_name: Impoant facts in Immunization, Newer Vaccines

question: All of following are true regarding Yellow fever vaccine except?
exp: Route of YF vaccine - Subcutaneous Strain used - 17 D Site of administration - at inseion of deltoid YF is only live vaccine that can be administered in pregnancy. Yellow fever and Cholera vaccine should not be given together: Maintain a gap of 3 weeks or more between them. Dose: 0. 5ml (irrespective of age)
opa: It is live attenuated, lyophilized vaccine
opc: WHO recommended validity of vaccination ceificate for international travel from 10 days after vaccination
topic_name: Impoant facts in Immunization, Newer Vaccines

question: Intramuscular Rabies vaccine Post exposure prophylaxis schedule is
exp: New Recommended Regimens/ Schedules { NEW GUIDELINES} Type of prophylaxis Regimen POST EXPOSURE INTRAMUSCULAR Essen Regimen (1-1-1-1-1) Day 0, 3, 7, 14, 28 POST EXPOSURE INTRADERMAL Updated Thai Red Cross Regimen (2-2-2-0-2) Day 0, 3, 7, 28 POST-EXPOSURE IN VACCINATED INDIVIDUALS Day 0, 3 PRE-EXPOSURE PROPHYLAXIS Day 0, 7, 21/28
topic_name: Impoant facts in Immunization, Newer Vaccines
